title: Another Hawaiian Volcano, Another Strava Record: Sparky Moir Sears is the New QOM of Mauna Kea
content:
The MTB pro from Colorado climbed the 55.59-mile and 15,127-foot segment in 6:12:51, besting the previous record by nearly an hour.

Read the full article at Another Hawaiian Volcano, Another Strava Record: Sparky Moir Sears is the New QOM of Mauna Kea on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
